title: Introducing: Little Magic
body: LA quartet **Little Magic’s** debut track, _Pretty Blue_, is proof that keeping it simple can be hugely effective. A sort of Angel Olsen meets Sharon Van Etten ode to a past on lover, it’s grounded amongst something quite natural sounding, all centred around Alex Aleco’s wistful vocal. Check it out below. Pretty Blue by little magic
